1.description: First, create the blade, positioning it as the prominent feature of the knife, which serves the essential function of cutting. This initial component is crucial as it establishes the overall shape and purpose of the knife, defining its role in both functionality and design.

2.description: Next, attach the handle to the base of the blade, ensuring it is securely fastened to provide a comfortable grip for the user. This connection is crucial as it not only balances the knife but also enhances control and safety during use, allowing for precise movements while cutting.

3.description: Finally, add the other_leaf to the opposite side of the blade, mirroring the first leaf to create a balanced and symmetrical design. This addition not only enhances the visual appeal of the object but also reinforces its structural integrity, ensuring that both leaves work together effectively during use.
